pr_title: chore: include support metrics in the project

 package io.confluent.support.metrics.utils;

timeline.message:
Include support metrics in the project

ksqlDB is the only user of these classes, so include it
in the project instead of consuming it as a library.
Adds BaseMetricsReporter, AvroSerializer and http deps.
Remove support for submitting to Kafka
Remove support for submitting to Kafka
